actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of excess earnings an individual who has attained retirement age may earn before suffering deductions from benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of excess earnings an individual who has attained retirement age may earn before having his or her benefits reduced.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of excess earnings an individual who has attained retirement age may earn before suffering deductions from benefits.
